title: Does the battery stop charging if I leave the phone plugged in overnight? It gets warm...
content: I have a cable that stops charging when the battery is at 100% but it doesn't work with the Pixel 4, and some online posts say the Pixel 4 stops charging the battery when it's at 100% and doesn't trickle-charge, but my phone is warm in the morning even though it should've been inactive and not charging for hours, so that leaves me wondering if I should get another cable that works with my Pixel 4...
